projects.title: Nissan: Natinal Signing Day Promotion
projects.description: Nissan wanted to add an animated homepage promotion to their website for national signing day. To do this I created an HTML5 video element which played a background video with links to the promotion.

projects.title: Nissan: Cube Interstital Page
projects.description: Built the intersitital page for the Nissan Cube to be fully responsive, fire proper analytics, follow suggested SEO guidelines, and work with our existing responsive codebase.

projects.title: Nissan: 2016 Titan XD Endurance V8 Gas Launch
projects.description: Built the 2016 Titan XD Endurance V8 Gas Engine teaser page from scratch to be fully responsive, optimized for speed, and used Javascript to enable deeplinking and enabled analytics.

projects.title: Nissan: Maxima SR Midnight
projects.description: Added carousel at the top of the website. Updated page layout and structure, and did some optimization for mobile.

projects.title: BetterDo. v3
projects.description:
Version 3 of BetterDo was a front-end rewrite. It utilizes AngularJS and localStorage, as well as a spice of Flexbox. I also built a build tool on top of GulpJS, providing code compression, SVG spritesheet generator, concatenation of files, and more.

We plan on open sourcing BetterDo once this rewrite is complete, and have already began moving everything to Git.

projects.title: Infiniti: Drivers Seat App
projects.description: Added responsive functionality, video modal, and marketing science tracking for video playback percentages. Also improved codebase throughout.

projects.title: Portfolio
projects.description:
Built this portfolio from scratch to showcase my experience with web technologies. I wanted to build a system which was easily maintainable, responsive, and used some fun next-level technologies.

This portfolio was built using AngularJS (try filtering these projects from the header or from a skills accordian), JSON for storing content (this information and more is coming from an ajax request), Gulp for minifying code; compressing images; enabling livereload; and more. It also uses contains some fun front-end features. The header of this page is using filters to alter the hue and is multiplying the background-image with the background-gradient to create a unique effect.

Make sure you're on an up-to-date browser for best results.

projects.title: BetterDo. v2
projects.description: Version 2 of my Todo app was a complete rewrite. Moved to Ajax based communication and LESS for styling. This project is in beta, so feel free to try.

projects.title: Fusion
projects.description: Developed the interface and user experience for the login panel of an online operating system. Unfortunately the project was discontinued.

projects.title: Broken City: Point of sale system
projects.description: For our capstone project at SAIT four of us developed a point of sale system for Broken City. We put an emphisis on speed, ease of use, and modern design. Wrote the front-end using JSPs and the back-end using Java and MySQL.

projects.title: CSS3: Stack Loading Animation
projects.description: Developed a stack loading effect using CSS3 animations.

projects.title: CSS3: USB/Lightening Connector
projects.description: Developed an Apple lightning cable and USB connector in pure CSS3.

projects.title: Classic Kennels
projects.description: Developed a web form for a local company called KlassicKennels for their grand opening. Got over 1k votes an hour, with a grand total of over 30k in the 14 day campaign.

projects.title: MyBobba
projects.description: Habbo is a popular online world for teenagers. During my younger teens I built a fansite for the game which allowed users to upload pictures of themselves and have unmoderated chat. It got very popular with about 1k hits a day. Unfortunately, I couldn't afford bandwidth and had to close its doors.

projects.title: MyPereira
projects.description: One of the first websites I built. This project was an advanced take on a family website. It had features like messaging, profiles, photo uploads, video sharing, etc.
